title: Group portrait of four men and eleven women, including one standing far right wearing eyeglasses and short sleeve polka dot dress with light colored bow on bib, holding dark handbag in left hand, gathered around table with light colored tablecloth, vase with light colored roses, and crystal punch bowl in interior with twisted crepe paper streamers, woman playing piano on right, and two framed pictures, including one with two seals bouncing a beach ball
medium: black and white: Kodak Safety Film
